title: The Coalmont Legend
description: From the little mining town of Coalmont comes a legend people rarely spoke about for it was just too fantastic to be taken seriously. Few people know the tale where a quiet little town was home to many mysteries such as the Symiclo curse, an elusive fire demon Skultch, the train robber's map of Bill Miner, along with the greatest mystery of all, a new comer named Harold Harken. Experience a vast adventure of countless discoveries, like how to find the meaning behind dreams and who 'the Big People,' are. Everyone has a story to tell, but few people have a story like this.The world is changing. It is important for us to know the Legends of our past so we are prepared for what we will encounter next.
author: Robert A.  Hunt
